data.title: Maxim's Youth (Yunost Maksima) — Fulton County Library System
data.meta_description: Maxim's Youth (Yunost Maksima) — A 1935 USA trade-paper reviewer called it... "an impressive and technically outstanding historical drama dealing with czarist terrorism and revolutionary boiling in the days of 1907. Picture is one of the Soviet prize winners and has particular merits in realistic performance, photography and movement, plus some musical touches in way of folk songs." Stalinskaya Premia, State Prize of Soviet Union, 1941. NBR Award-Top Foreign Films, National Board of Review-USA, 1935. In Russian with English subtitles. Directed by Grigoriy Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg. Soviet Union.
